home.description: Your culinary assistant for all your kitchen needs
home.recipes_description: Explore and manage your favorite cooking recipes
home.cleaning_description: Discover household cleaning tips and recipes
home.tips_description: Learn helpful cooking tips and kitchen hacks
home.meat_temperatures_description: Reference guide for safe meat cooking temperatures
home.tips_rotation_description: Culinary tips that change every minute
home.shopping_detail: Create your shopping list automatically from your favorite recipes. Add, edit and organize ingredients to make your shopping efficient.

auth.email_not_confirmed: Please confirm your email address before logging in. Check your inbox for the confirmation link.
auth.reset_email_sent: Password reset instructions sent to your email
auth.reset_email_sent_message: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
auth.check_inbox: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
auth.loginRequired: Please log in to view this recipe
auth.email_changed_login_required: Email updated. Please login with your new email address.

shopping.no_items: No items in your shopping list

meatTemps.title: Meat Cooking Temperatures Guide
meatTemps.subtitle: Curious about exact temperatures for each meat? Discover more
meatTemps.temperature_note: Note: Always use a meat thermometer for accuracy
meatTemps.beef_tip: Beef can be safely consumed at lower temperatures
meatTemps.pork_tip: Modern pork can be slightly pink when fully cooked
meatTemps.poultry_tip: Poultry must always reach the recommended safe temperature
meatTemps.fish_tip: Fish is done when it flakes easily with a fork

cleaning.no_recipes: You haven't created any cleaning recipes yet. Click the + button to get started!

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.email_verification_note: You will receive a verification email if you change your email. Your session will be closed and you will need to log in again.
settings.email_verification_sent: A verification email has been sent to your new email address.
settings.email_verification_sent_logout: A verification email has been sent to your new email address. After confirming, your session will be closed and you will need to log in again with your new email.
settings.delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
settings.delete_account_question: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.delete_account_warning: By deleting your account, all your data will be permanently erased, including your recipes and personal settings.

errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.username_taken: That username is already in use

goodbye.title: See You Soon!
goodbye.message: Your account has been successfully deleted. We're sorry to see you go.
goodbye.comeback: If you ever wish to return, we'll be delighted to have you back.
goodbye.already_logged_in: This page is only accessible after deleting your account
